text.section: On or before January 1 of each year, the Corporation and the Commission shall report to the Governor and, in accordance with § 2-1246 of the State Government Article, the General Assembly on the progress of State-funded stem cell research conducted in accordance with this part.

The report shall identify:
each recipient of money from the Fund;
the amount of money awarded to each recipient; and
a description of the type of stem cell research performed by the recipient.
